cards.title: Mortgage Loan Agreement
prompts: Summarize the sample loan mortgage agreement located in the sample loan mortgage folder in the demo Vendia S3 storage connection in simple, layman terms for a non-lawyer audience in a few lines
As a homeowner, explain and summarize the sample loan mortgage agreement located in the sample loan mortgage folder in the demo Vendia S3 storage connection to me in simple terms
As an investor, explain and summarize the sample loan mortgage agreement located in the sample loan mortgage folder in the demo Vendia S3 storage connection to me in simple terms

List all the homeowner protections that appear â€” for example, notice before foreclosure, complaint handling, data privacy, or loss mitigation help, in the sample loan mortgage agreement located in the sample loan mortgage folder in the demo Vendia S3 storage connection

cards.title: NYC Taxi Data
prompts: Locate and summarize the contents of the NYC taxi data csv file from NYC taxi data folder in the demo Vendia S3 storage connection
For the NYC taxi data file in the NYC taxi data folder in the demo Vendia S3 storage connection, show revenue loss analysis for yellow taxis - how much money did they lose to ride-sharing
For the NYC taxi data file in the NYC taxi data folder in the demo Vendia S3 storage connection, show driver utilization patterns - avg hours per day per driver trends
